Bib API documentation version v1

http://github.com/sling-incubator/lsp-apis

Bib API in the circulation context

This documents the API calls that can be made for bibs to fulfill circulation functionality

Bibs

Collection of bib items.

/bibs get post

get

Retrieve a list of bib items.

post

Create a new bib item.

get /bibs

Retrieve a list of bib items.

  • Request
  • Response

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Query Parameters

  • view: (string)

    displays a [brief] or [full] view of the returned entities - for example: show brief view of the entities

  • offset: (integer - maximum: 1000)

    Skip over a number of elements by specifying an offset value for the query

  • limit: (integer - default: 10 - maximum: 100)

    Limit the number of elements returned in the response

    Example:

    10
  • orderBy: (string)

    Order by field: field A, field B

  • order: (one of desc, asc - default: desc)

    Order

  • query: (string)

    JSON array [{"field1","value1","operator1"},{"field2","value2","operator2"},...,{"fieldN","valueN","operatorN"}] with valid searchable fields: for example fieldA

    Example:

    ["Title", "Of Mice And Men", "="]

HTTP status code 200

Returns a list of bib items

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "bib_data": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "bib_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "bib_view": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "Title": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "Author": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "publication_date": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "desc": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "required": [
          "bib_id",
          "bib_view"
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "bib_data"
  ]
}

Example:

{
  "bib_data": [
    {
      "bib_id": "23344156380001021",
      "bib_view": {
        "Title": "Of Mice And Men",
        "Author": "J. Stienbeck",
        "publication_date": "1413879432450",
        "desc": "description"
      }
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 400

Bad request, e.g malformed request body or query parameter. Details of the error (e.g name of the parameter or line/character number with malformed data) provided in the response.

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

unable to list bibs -- malformed parameter 'query', syntax error at column 6

HTTP status code 401

No valid token found

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 403

Access denied not valid privilage in resurces

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 500

Internal server error, e.g due to misconfiguration

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

internal server error, contact administrator

post /bibs

Create a new bib item.

  • Request
  • Response

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "bib_data": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "bib_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "bib_view": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "Title": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "Author": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "publication_date": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "desc": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "required": [
          "bib_id",
          "bib_view"
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "bib_data"
  ]
}

Example:

{
  "bib_data": [
    {
      "bib_view": {
        "Title": "Of Mice And Men",
        "Author": "J. Stienbeck",
        "publication_date": "1413879432450",
        "desc": "description"
      }
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 201

Returns a newly created item, with server-controlled fields like 'id' populated

Headers

  • Location: (string)

    URI to the created bib item

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "bib_data": [
    {
      "bib_id": "23344156380001021",
      "bib_view": {
        "Title": "Of Mice And Men",
        "Author": "J. Stienbeck",
        "publication_date": "1413879432450",
        "desc": "description"
      }
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 400

Bad request, e.g malformed request body or query parameter. Details of the error (e.g name of the parameter or line/character number with malformed data) provided in the response.

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

"unable to add bib -- malformed JSON at 13:3"

HTTP status code 401

No valid token found

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 403

Access denied not valid privilage in resurces

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 500

Internal server error, e.g. due to misconfiguration

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Internal server error, contact administrator

/bibs/{bibId} get delete put

Entity representing a bib

get

Retrieve bib item with given {bibId}

delete

Delete bib item with given {bibId}

put

Update bib item with given {bibId}

get /bibs/{bibId}

Retrieve bib item with given {bibId}

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • bibId: required (string)

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Query Parameters

  • view: (string)

    displays a [brief] or [full] view of the returned entities - for example: show [brief] or [full] view of the entities

HTTP status code 200

Returns item with a given ID

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "bib_data": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "bib_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "bib_view": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "Title": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "Author": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "publication_date": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "desc": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "required": [
          "bib_id",
          "bib_view"
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "bib_data"
  ]
}

Example:

{
  "bib_data": [
    {
      "bib_id": "23344156380001021",
      "bib_view": {
        "Title": "Of Mice And Men",
        "Author": "J. Stienbeck",
        "publication_date": "1413879432450",
        "desc": "description"
      }
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 401

No valid token found

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 403

Access denied not valid privilage in resurces

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 404

Item with a given ID not found

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

"bib not found"

HTTP status code 500

Internal server error, e.g. due to misconfiguration

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

internal server error, contact administrator

delete /bibs/{bibId}

Delete bib item with given {bibId}

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • bibId: required (string)

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

HTTP status code 204

Item deleted successfully

HTTP status code 400

Bad request, e.g malformed request body or query parameter. Details of the error (e.g name of the parameter or line/character number with malformed data) provided in the response.

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

"unable to delete bib -- constraint violation"

No valid token found

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 404

Item with a given ID not found

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

"bib not found"

HTTP status code 409

Unable to delete bib. Item is linked to this bib

HTTP status code 500

Internal server error, e.g. due to misconfiguration

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Internal server error, contact administrator

Update bib item with given {bibId}

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • bibId: required (string)

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "bib_data": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "bib_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "bib_view": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "Title": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "Author": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "publication_date": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "desc": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "required": [
          "bib_id",
          "bib_view"
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "bib_data"
  ]
}

Example:

{
  "bib_data": [
    {
      "bib_id": "23344156380001021",
      "bib_view": {
        "Title": "Of Mice And Men",
        "Author": "J. Stienbeck",
        "publication_date": "1413879432450",
        "desc": "description"
      }
    }
  ]
}

Item successfully updated

internal server error, contact administrator

/bibs/{bibId}/requests get post

Bib level requests.

  • List of requests per the given bib
  • Add request per given bib

get

Retrieve a list of request items.

post

Create a new request item.

get /bibs/{bibId}/requests

Retrieve a list of request items.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • bibId: required (string)

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Query Parameters

  • offset: (integer - maximum: 1000)

    Skip over a number of elements by specifying an offset value for the query

  • limit: (integer - default: 10 - maximum: 100)

    Limit the number of elements returned in the response

    Example:

    10
  • status: required (one of active, history - default: active)

    Return requests that are either only active (default) or history of all requests (anonymized requests will not be returned)

  • request_type: (one of HOLD, DIGITIZATION, BOOKING, ALL - default: ALL)

    Filter by a specific request type

HTTP status code 200

Returns a list of request items

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "item_request": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "request_status": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "place_in_queue": {
            "type": "integer"
          },
          "request_date": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "request_type": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "request_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "pickup_location": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "item_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "bib_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "patron_id": {
            "type": "string"
          }
        },
        "required": [
          "request_id",
          "item_id",
          "patron_id"
        ]
      }
    },
    "total_record_count": {
      "type": "integer"
    }
  }
}

Example:

{
  "item_request": [
    {
      "request_status": "NOT_STARTED",
      "place_in_queue": 11,
      "request_date": "2015-12-12",
      "request_type": "HOLD|RECALL|MOVE|DIGITIZATION|BOOKING|ETC...",
      "request_id": "00000000900111",
      "pickup_location": "MATHLIB",
      "item_id": "23344156380001021",
      "bib_id": "13344156380001021",
      "patron_id": "Me123"
    }
  ],
  "total_record_count": 1
}

HTTP status code 400

Bad request, e.g malformed request body or query parameter. Details of the error (e.g name of the parameter or line/character number with malformed data) provided in the response.

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

unable to list requests -- malformed parameter 'query', syntax error at column 6

HTTP status code 401

No valid token found

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 403

Access denied not valid privilage in resurces

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 500

Internal server error, e.g due to misconfiguration

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

internal server error, contact administrator

post /bibs/{bibId}/requests

Create a new request item.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • bibId: required (string)

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "item_request": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "request_status": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "place_in_queue": {
            "type": "integer"
          },
          "request_date": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "request_type": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "request_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "pickup_location": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "item_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "bib_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "patron_id": {
            "type": "string"
          }
        },
        "required": [
          "request_id",
          "item_id",
          "patron_id"
        ]
      }
    },
    "total_record_count": {
      "type": "integer"
    }
  }
}

Example:

{
  "item_request": [
    {
      "request_status": "NOT_STARTED",
      "place_in_queue": 11,
      "request_date": "2015-12-12",
      "request_type": "HOLD|RECALL|MOVE|DIGITIZATION|BOOKING|ETC...",
      "pickup_location": "MATHLIB",
      "item_id": "23344156380001021",
      "bib_id": "13344156380001021",
      "patron_id": "Me123"
    }
  ],
  "total_record_count": 1
}

/bibs/{bibId}/requests/{requestId} get delete put

Bib level requests.

  • Get s specific request per the given bib
  • Update request per given bib
  • Delete request per given bib.

get

Retrieve request item with given {requestId}

delete

Delete request item with given {requestId}

put

Update request item with given {requestId}

get /bibs/{bibId}/requests/{requestId}

Retrieve request item with given {requestId}

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • bibId: required (string)
  • requestId: required (string)

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

HTTP status code 200

Returns item with a given ID

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",

  "properties": {

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{
  "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "item_request": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "request_status": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "place_in_queue": {
            "type": "integer"
          },
          "request_date": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "request_type": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "request_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "pickup_location": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "item_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "bib_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "patron_id": {
            "type": "string"
          }
        },
        "required": [
          "request_id",
          "item_id",
          "patron_id"
        ]
      }
    },
    "total_record_count": {
      "type": "integer"
    }
  }
}

Example:

{
  "item_request": [
    {
      "request_status": "NOT_STARTED",
      "place_in_queue": 11,
      "request_date": "2015-12-12",
      "request_type": "HOLD|RECALL|MOVE|DIGITIZATION|BOOKING|ETC...",
      "request_id": "00000000900111",
      "pickup_location": "MATHLIB",
      "item_id": "23344156380001021",
      "bib_id": "13344156380001021",
      "patron_id": "Me123"
    }
  ],
  "total_record_count": 1
}

HTTP status code 204

Item successfully updated

HTTP status code 400

Bad request, e.g malformed request body or query parameter. Details of the error (e.g name of the parameter or line/character number with malformed data) provided in the response.

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

"unable to update request -- malformed JSON at 13:4"

HTTP status code 401

No valid token found

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 403

Access denied not valid privilage in resurces

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

Unauthorized

HTTP status code 404

Item with a given ID not found

Body

Type: text/plainn

Example:

"request not found"

HTTP status code 500

Internal server error, e.g. due to misconfiguration

Body

Type: text/plain

Example:

internal server error, contact administrator

/bibs/{bibId}/items get post

Items services

  • Return list of items
  • Create an Item

get

Retrieve a list of item items.

post

Create a new item item.

get /bibs/{bibId}/items

Retrieve a list of item items.

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • bibId: required (string)

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Query Parameters

  • offset: (integer - maximum: 1000)

    Skip over a number of elements by specifying an offset value for the query

  • limit: (integer - default: 10 - maximum: 100)

    Limit the number of elements returned in the response

    Example:

    10

HTTP status code 200

Returns a list of item items

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{"$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "item_data": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "item_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "bib_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "barcode": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "location": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "value": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "desc": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          },
          "status": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "value": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "desc": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          },
          "material_type": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "value": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "desc": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "icon": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          },
          "copy_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "item_link": {
            "type": "string"
          },
          "shelf_location": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
              "classification_number": {
                "type": "string"
              },
              "shelf_listing_number": {
                "type": "string"
              }
            }
          }
        },
        "required": [
          "location",
          "status",
          "material_type",
          "item_link",
          "bib_id"
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "required": [
    "item_data"
  ]
}

Example:

{
  "item_data": [
    {
      "item_id": "23344156380001021",
      "barcode": "39031031697261",
      "location": {
        "value": "STACK",
        "desc": "Stacks (STACK)"
      },
      "status": {
        "value": "01",
        "desc": "ITEM_STATUS_MISSING"
      },
      "material_type": {
        "value": "BOOK",
        "desc": "Book",
        "icon": "book.png"
      },
      "shelf_location": {
        "classification_number": "1234567890",
        "shelf_listing_number": "12345678"
      },
      "copy_id": "1",
      "item_link": "/bibs/99100383909999/item/1234567890009999",
      "bib_id": "99100383909999"
    }
  ]
}

Type: text/plain

Example:

unable to list items -- malformed parameter 'query', syntax error at column 6

HTTP status code 201

Returns a newly created item, with server-controlled fields like 'id' populated

Headers

  • Location: (string)

    URI to the created item item

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "item_data": [
    {
      "item_id": "23344156380001021",
      "barcode": "39031031697261",
      "location": {
        "value": "STACK",
        "desc": "Stacks (STACK)"
      },
      "status": {
        "value": "01",
        "desc": "ITEM_STATUS_MISSING"

/bibs/{bibId}/items/{itemId} get delete put

Entity representing a item

get

Retrieve item item with given {itemId}

delete

Delete item item with given {itemId}

put

Update item item with given {itemId}

get /bibs/{bibId}/items/{itemId}

Retrieve item item with given {itemId}

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • bibId: required (string)
  • itemId: required (string)

Headers

  • Authorization: required (string)

    Used to send a valid JWT token.

    Example:

    Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiYWRtaW4iOnRydWV9.TJVA95OrM7E2cBab30RMHrHDcEfxjoYZgeFONFh7HgQ

Query Parameters

  • view: (string)

    displays a [brief] or [full] view of the returned entities - for example: show full view of the entities

HTTP status code 200

Returns item with a given ID

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

{"$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#",
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "item_data": {
      "type": "array",
      "items": {
        "type": "object",
        "properties": {
          "item_id": {
            "type": "string"
          },
